name: Dinesh Bajgain
bio: I'm a passionate full-stack developer exploring the intersection of AI and web development. I enjoy building real-world applications with a deep focus on learning concepts from scratch and creating meaningful, user-centric solutions.
detailedBio: I specialize in developing modern web applications while actively working on AI-driven projects such as face recognition systems and chatbots. Driven by curiosity and long-term impact, I continuously learn, experiment, and build technologies that solve real problems and push my skills forward.
